rooms.desc: You are in the front room of a house. There are stairs leading up to the first floor. You noticed someone wrote the numbers 3,4,1,2 on a wall.
You are in a corridor with three doors, to your left with a number 1, in front of you with a number 2, and to your right with a number 3. There are stairs going back down to the ground floor.
This room has no exit other than the door you just came through.
As soon as you entered this room the door behind you disappeared! This room has no exit.
There is a door with number 4 on your left, and another door leading back to the corridor.
This room has no exit other than the door you just came through.
